scripts.say: Why, I didn't expect Team Red's flagship herself to appear right before me.
An exercise is no place for lollygagging. Kaga may start acting haphazardly if I don't show myself.
Still, you must be quite confident to appear on the front in person. This is no mere game to you, is it?
Perhaps so. It is true I like devising new strategies, but never once have I said I am an incapable soldier.
Indeed... I fully believe that it's a fortunate thing I am not your enemy.
But still, here I stand, blocking your way, like the enemy would.
If you wish to pass, you must first defeat me!
Then let us have a fight in good spirit. *Giggle*...
